```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(extrafont)
```


## Data

```{r}
data_alcohol <- read_csv("total-alcohol-consumption-per-capita-litres-of-pure-alcohol.csv")
```

```{r}
data_alcohol <- data_alcohol %>%
  filter(str_detect(string = Entity,
           pattern = "Brazil|Europe|South America|Africa|Asia|North America|Oceania|World")) %>%
  filter(str_detect(Entity,"South Africa|European",negate = TRUE)) %>%
  rename("Total" = `Total alcohol consumption per capita (liters of pure alcohol, projected estimates, 15+ years of age)`)
```

```{r}
data_alcohol %>% 
  mutate(Total = round(Total,2)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(Year), y = Entity, fill = Total, label = Total)) +
  geom_tile(col = "white") +
  geom_text() + 
  viridis::scale_fill_viridis()
```
